ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace DetoxDemo.xcworkspace -scheme DetoxDemo -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace DetoxDemo.xcworkspace -scheme DetoxDemo -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 7
